attributes.action: Breakout Dance Company - Dance space needed for youths of Watford!
attributes.additional_details: Popular and fast growing dance company in Watford offering classes to mixed ability's, genders and ages in the Watford community, urgently require there own dance centre in which they can offer more classes to the community but still keeping the prices affordable to everyone. Main aim - Keep youths off the streets, build a strong friendship within the community, keeping costs low so everyone can join the company.
